text: Blind Injustice may refer to: * Blind Injustice, 2005 film by Rex Piano * Blind Injustice (book), 2017 book by Mark Godfrey about wrongful imprisonment * Blind Injustice (opera), 2019 opera about wrongful imprisonment and exoneration, based on a book of the same title by Mark Godfrey
title: Blind Injustice (disambiguation)
